page.title: 12My Road:Hadleigh (Layham)
page.content: I live at the end of a private No Through Road, in a converted granary. Next to my house is the Mill House and opposite is the Layham Mill still in working order. The river (R.Brett) floods about twice a year. The water comes right under our house which is on stilts.The river runs right round our house and the Mill House. There is a playing field the other side of the lane which is grown for Hay in the summer. Right up at the top of the lane there is Watermill Close and Brett Green. (Lynsey Parnham - 10yrs)
